website_summaries.verdict: Choose this attractive, modern alarm clock if you like the idea of waking to your favorite music from a device that's both a reliable timekeeper and smart speaker.
pros: Features Melody, the brand's voice assistant that enables you to control music preferences with your voice and pairs easily with other Bluetooth devices
Also has dual alarm settings, FM radio, and USB port
cons: Sound quality is OK, but not the best
The downside to the numerous functions is that it takes a little time to learn how to use them

customer_reviews.title: Overall works well
customer_reviews.text: Pros: FM radio reception is amazing!! I live in a dense urban area and reception is crystal clear. Bluetooth easy to set up. Alarms easy to set up. USB ports are handy. Sound quality good. Cons: The dots between the hour and minute on the clock continually flash. Manufacturer states this is normal operation. Annoying and hope future models will fix this. Instructions could be a bit more detailed regarding wake and sleep functions.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a small radio
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new clock radio that had Bluetooth and this one is working well. I like the small size since it doesn’t take up much room on my night stand. The sound quality is very good, especially for the size. The Bluetooth works great, no cutting in and out, the volume is very consistent and it doesn’t cut in and out like another radio I tried. I don’t like that all the buttons are the same size and all in a row... you really have to look at the top of the piece to see what you are pushing because there is no way to tell the difference. But other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Eyyys

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: After a previous iHome Clock Radio gave up the ghost after years of good performance, I decided to order this clock radio. After receiving it, I promptly unpackaged it and set it up to try the product. The setup was pretty easy but listening to the FM Radio stations was disappointing because they sounded like either poor reception or poor sound quality from the speakers. I paired my Phone through Bluetooth and played some music but the sound didn't get any better so I concluded that the general sound quality was very poor! I promptly put it back in the box and shipped it back the next day! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Galen Liebelt

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Freezing Up
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this device for about a week now. I do like the features and it’s perfect for what I wanted. But for some reason, it keeps locking up so that the time will no longer change and none of the features work. I have to keep unplugging it and removing the batteries daily and resetting the whole thing all over again. This is super inconvenient and I’m not keeping it if that’s the way it’s going to be. Since there are mostly good reviews, I’ll probably just return it and ask for another one. But if the replacement unit does the same thing, I will be updating my review and will ask for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Robin, RN Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: A great radio, I had issues finding a radio that could pick up the stations I listen to. But this one works great! It picks up the stations without even unrolling the antenna! Easy to set the presets for the radio. The clock is very bright if you want it or you can dim it as well.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and controls are intuitive. Very clear sound, good bass, and strong reception, although I guess that depends on where you are. I wish it had AM radio as I like to listen to that in the shower, but the Bluetooth allows me to play my own music in the morning...very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. O.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: As an alarm clock this gets a 3.5/5. The instructions aren’t great and it’s not exactly intuitive to use. The speaker gets 1/5. I wasn’t expecting great sound quality but I was hoping for something that sounds better than iPhone speakers. Also, you have to pair the Bluetooth every time by holding a button on the alarm clock so playing anything from the next room is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: invizable

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Clock Radio!
customer_reviews.text: A good alarm clock in a market where there seems to be very few name brand competitors. I am happy with my purchase and the only reason for not getting a 5th star is that I wish the alarm volume could have one additional lower setting. When the alarm radio or buzzer sounds it’s a little loud for my liking set at the lowest level of 1, but I am getting used to it. Also the alarm off button could be a little further away or larger than the other buttons for the convenience of turning it off. Other that that, I have no concerns and I am pleased with my iHome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as bad for millenials––but still terrible
customer_reviews.text: If you’re not skilled with IT controls (like how long to wait after pushing a setting button), it’s difficult to use the controls. It took me over an hour just to set the presets for stations and my alarm time. Otherwise it worked well though I would like to be able to adjust bass and treble. BUT after 2 weeks, the mode button which meant nothing worked except the alarm buzzer stopped working as did the dimmer controls to set the brightness. What a poor product!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I had a iHome alarm clock I used for over 10 yrs and it just recently quit working (been dropped one too many times). So I searched out another one and chose this one. It has a very good sound for playing my music, listening to podcast and audible books. Easy set up and the bluetooth connected to my android phone right away. I really like the multiple light levels, I can use it for a night light if I have to get up or dim it all the way down. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Cole

customer_reviews.title: Buttons Fail After a Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock to replace another IHOME product I had for years, After a year the buttons on the top started to fail. If I tried to change the time on alarm 2 it would trigger alarm 1 or do other wired stuff. The thing is I dont use these buttons often once the alarms are set they stay that way I might change thing up one a year. There is no wear and tare on the buttons from use it is just plain junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but complicated settings
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker sound in a small package for a reasonable price and fits the bill for bedside radio/alarm clock Numbers and buttons are a little smaller than I would like but I'm getting used to it. Setting up the preset stations and alarm is not intuitive so keep the instructions handy! There are two alarms setting options for 5-day and 2-day which assumes everyone works M-F so this is not ideal for all. The 2 USB chargers are convenient so you don't need another electrical outlet to charge you devices. Have not tried the bluetooth feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the alarm I've been looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is incredible!! The FM reception is great... Has the 7-5-2 setting I need... CONS: buttons a little hard to figure out, but has the features you can set and forget.... Lot's of advance features (bluetooth, answer phone, etc) not sure I will use most of them, but still a great alarm radio for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Love waking up to music by way blue tooth from my tablet
customer_reviews.text: For a little item the sound is good. I got it mainly for the bedroom but it hasn't left the kitchen. I use it about 6 to 8 hours a day doing things around the house from music to talk show. I was a unsure about this item so I bought from an open box item for $10 less . It is a worth while investment I recommend it to anybody thats looking for a little buddy.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID  LASH

customer_reviews.title: Great clock that charges my devices too
customer_reviews.text: I really love this clock. Great display, not too bright. Two USB slots I can use to charge my phone and my Apple Watch, the two devices I want by my bedside. Only critique is that I had a little trouble syncing it with my phone and they were going to get with me to solve the problem. They never did, but in the meantime, I tried it again and it worked, so I guess we are okay. I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa T.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, the display ruins all the technology
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality and that I can charge my IPad with it over night. It players my music from my iPad also. The music alarm starts low and gets louder without that annoying loud click and full volume from my old one. The downside, the display is too bright, it does have a dimmer, but when you dim it you can no longer tell the time at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy De Lisle

customer_reviews.title: Functions cease working
customer_reviews.text: How does a radio get a one star review? One or all of its functions stop working. I listen to the radio a lot, so I bought 3 of these to cover both ends of the house and upstairs. I’ve had iPhone radios before and they worked well and were reliable. I thought I was set for years. The first radio failed when the On/Off button quit working. The second one quit connecting to my Bluetooth phone. The third one in the last 3 days has begun spontaneously changing the time setting. It appears to me that either the workmanship or the materials are faulty with every unit. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great clock radio
customer_reviews.text: Sounds wonderful. Took me awhile to learn all the settings, but very happy with my purchase. Favorite feature is how easy it is to dim the blue light so it doesn't keep me awake.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: I Like It - Nothing is perfect, but this does the job well...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the display will dim all the way to off. I like the gradual increase of the alarm volume. I like the dual alarms. Pretty easy to use. Very nice looking. Very good sound quality for the size. Has that simulated bass sound, but much better than some cheap clock radios and their horrible timmy sound. My only want is that the dimmer button, not be shared as the snooze button. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good alarm clock with some minor downsides
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alarm clock that let me set two alarms; one for weekdays and one for weekends. This has that feature, which is great. It seems like only iHome has that and only on certain models. The biggest downside of this product is the screen. Rather than the numbers being illuminated, the whole screen is lit up and the numbers are darker. This makes it light up the room quite a bit unless you have it on the lowest brightness setting. But the lowest brightness setting also makes it harder to read from across the room. Overall, I'm pretty happy with this alarm clock. It's not perfect, but it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery T. Deboer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty alright.
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent system. Sound quality is good. Screen display also good. Only issue I have is that the buttons require a very specific touch that is not too light, not too hard, and directly in the middle of the button to work. Make changing anything annoying at times.
customer_reviews.author: P.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great clock radio with many great features.
customer_reviews.text: I search the internet relentlessly for almost a month. I be ended up purchasing three different name brands and each turned out to be junk. I returned them. Last chance... I purchased the iHome iBT231 Bluetooth Dual Alarm FM Clock Radio with dual alarms & USB charging ports and was pleasantly satisfied. It was the only one that had great speakers and sound. All features work just fine. Overall, I give it “5” ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: PJ McT

customer_reviews.title: Good Clock
customer_reviews.text: I like the clock. It's easy to use. The only downside to it is it uses dark numbers against a lighter background. My wife likes to keep the light down low and it can be hard to read the numbers as the background gets darker. Other than that, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: LanceB

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock with great features
customer_reviews.text: Love this since it has dual USB and 6 FM radio presets. I bought this for my office as I like to have a radio for background noise. The only complaint I have is that the lowest volume setting is still pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Durtschi

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I run a small B&B and wanted to upgrade my older "iPod docking" units. This was a pleasant surprise to find such great sound quality in a small unit. Bluetooth pairing is easy. Good to have the USB charging ports on the back. Too many buttons on the top with not the easiest icons on each to easily ascertain their function for a first time user. Repeated use makes the unit more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: James Yeaman

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock radio.
customer_reviews.text: Fits easily and looks good on the night stand. Great features, learning to operate is a steep learning curve, but if you can read directions, it's straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Speaker noise when using USB charging.
customer_reviews.text: Two major complaints: 1) when using the USB charging, the speakers emit a kind of high-pitched whine/hiss. This is also true of some of the dimness settings. 2) The face is very bright, but when you try to dim it you can’t see the time at all in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Setting alarms weekly due to retail hours!
customer_reviews.text: We have two, of these Sound Design iBT 231B and the directions in the book are hard to understand when it comes to setting the alarms. We really wanted to wake up to radio and we settled for the buzzer. Annoying! We even went to YouTube to watch a video and this one is not listed at all. Can I get an explanation that make sense or a tutorial that explains it step by step? Thanks Patty
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, I only brought it for the music, clock & radio ... I keep mines in the bathroom for when I’m shaving or showering ... I don’t use all the other features....
customer_reviews.author: K.G

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup does not work
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of the gravity style of the cell phone holder. Suction cup will not support even its own weight. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BILL MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Lots of personalization settings with great sound quality.  Got all I wanted with good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality...solid bass and mid tones. Dimmer settings (9) from bright (good in daytime) to display off...love the variability. Sleep timer 120,90,60,30,15 min. Dual alarms (repeat on 2 day, 5 day, 7 day schedule) with setting for how long you want to snooze...easy to turn each alarm on and off. Easy to setup...good controls. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Wear

customer_reviews.title: Static
customer_reviews.text: radio signal is uter crap, bt and aux work fine but i dont trust them to wake me up if the other device doesn't play.
customer_reviews.author: L. hudd

customer_reviews.title: Sound sucks
customer_reviews.text: Compact, neat design. Unfortunately, the sound from the speaker is of low quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzee Boi

customer_reviews.title: Great little Bluetooth radio/speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall great little Bluetooth radio/speaker!!! The sounds quality is as excepted for the size of the speaker, smaller than it looks. I love the usb outputs to charge other items. Good radio reception so to the external antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality not great
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and is functional but I was disappointed in the sound quality as this is my main source for playing music.
customer_reviews.author: tefljudy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this little radio so much. I used it in my home office to listen to radio while working. The reception for the radio is excellent! No interference.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Th

customer_reviews.title: This thing worked well for 10 months and then just died on me.  No sound and no reset button.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions in the manual are sketchy and it's hard to get a live person on the line to process a warranty return.
customer_reviews.author: AttyBand

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Nice display.Great size. It's hard to use you have to go back to manual everytime
customer_reviews.author: Wally brown

customer_reviews.title: Its not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Still can not figure out how to set music to alarm wake up it's still the annoying tone. Sound isn't that great. One of my regretful purchases
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Defective ihome unit upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The ihome Unit is defective upon arrival , once connected to bluetooth the screen scrambles and no sound comes out.. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: zfinelifedotcom

customer_reviews.title: Keeps time and doubles as a homing beacon
customer_reviews.text: The clock works great, and I like the dual alarms, but if I turn it up so it’s bright enough to read, a small aircraft could mistake it for a landing beacon. If I turn it down (I like my room dark), I have to fish a pair of reading glasses out of a drawer to see it.
customer_reviews.author: Kmcg

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but I was not impressed with the sound. I bought it to use in my office so I wasn't blasting it - but it still sounded really bad. Just was not for me.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Alarms complicated
customer_reviews.text: Alarms very complicated to navigate through and especially to turn off. Buttons are depressed so they’re just not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Display, Bluetooth and USB Port
customer_reviews.text: Clear display, easy & reliable bluetooth connection, and a USB port via which I charge my phone. A great addition which allows me to listen to tunes or podcasts when working in my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bluetooth clock radio!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised at how nice this little Bluetooth system sounds. Links with my Kindle immediately. Doesn't have much bass, but the sound is full-bodied and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Peterson

customer_reviews.title: A decent clock radio.
customer_reviews.text: It’s small, compact and it tells the time. I have had other IHome products and some have not lasted that long so I am not sure why I went with these. Maybe because of the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clock/radio with bluetooth !
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock/radio,it has a sleek,contemporary style,it's bright, it can be adjusted if necessary it's very easy to read,to set. I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Retro62

customer_reviews.title: Great radio.
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. Especially like the adjustable light that offers several brightness levels. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy cheaper one. I returned them all cuz they were so hard to set up. I paid more and got better one. So easy to set up. Everything's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny day

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. When I listen to the radio it doesn’t sound as clear but you get use to it. It does the job for what I need
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Clock
customer_reviews.text: I hate gradually escalating alarms. They just lullaby me back to sleep. I needed an alarm to startle me awake and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: ROBBYN B.

customer_reviews.title: Alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I really like this clock! It's bright screen is great, sound is great, I love pretty much everything this clock offers.
customer_reviews.author: Imma Dimeo

customer_reviews.title: Great radio clock with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my intended use- in the bathroom. Sound quality is impressive for the price point, picks up radio stations well and is plenty loud to hear while in the shower
customer_reviews.author: O-Fish-Al

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I wish the display was black with white numbers. That’s a buyer problem, not a manufacturer problem. We are happy with it, nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Ten Bears & Raccoon Allie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect. Nice bright display with cool features. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Loud Radio
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to be loud to wake me up and it does the trick. In addtion , it is esay to set up.
customer_reviews.author: E. Threatt

customer_reviews.title: Love the option to pick days  alarm goes off
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can select for the alarm to only go off during my work week (Monday- Friday) and not have to worry about turning it back on on Sunday nights. I also have the option to choose an alarm 2 for the weekends, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chela Chicago

customer_reviews.title: easy to use sleek design
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. It's very easy to use and program. It paired easily with my phone and the controls are very intuitive. It also looks nice. Happy I got it and much happier than a cheesy competitor product I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: Several alarm options
customer_reviews.text: I like the 2 alarms. I like that I do not have to reset it each day. I chose the Monday to Friday alarm. It’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great! The clock works fabulously. Does not need a rocket scientist to use. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Scuito

customer_reviews.title: Several issues, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Volume buttons sometimes change mode or do the opposite of what they're supposed to. Volume will automatically decrease even when up all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: That this sucks
customer_reviews.text: This sucks it randomly connects to things in my house
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sound quality from my iHome. I just have a difficult time pairing my phone via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Good way to wake up!
customer_reviews.text: This radio alarm clock is great - really good sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm radio clock!
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Great alarm radio. Can adjust brightness from non to alot
customer_reviews.author: d beaver

customer_reviews.title: Alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: For son in law... as long as he isn't late for work
customer_reviews.author: kimberly butler

customer_reviews.title: What a great radio!
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio!! I put it in our bathroom. Everything about it is perfect!! And what a deal on the price! One day delivery, too!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Zadrozny

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound!
customer_reviews.text: This radio fits beautifully in my office and sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: No sound at all from radio or when connected to Bluetooth. Did a reset per instruction manual and nothing. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Great Value !!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp design. Sound quality is very good. Fits nicely on my night stand. VERY satisfied with my purchase. Highly recommend this product as it was much more than I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Coccitti

customer_reviews.title: Great Alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for everyday use. I am usually a light sleeper, but with this alarm clock waking up to the loudest sound wakes me up.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the area I wanted to use it. Good sound and easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I will probably by another one to put in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: S Nickisch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set time and date and wake to features.
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews before purchasing and now that I have had this alarm clock for several months, I have had no issues. I am not a technical person at all but i found this clock easy to set and use. I am a heavy sleeper , it takes a lot to wake me ,this alarm will wake you up. I also like the 3, 5 and 7 day feature. I set mine to the 5 day Monday thru Friday , love the easy reset button that readies the alarm for the next workday.
customer_reviews.author: M.J. REYES

product_meta.title: iHome iBT231 Bluetooth Dual Alarm FM Clock Radio with Speakerphone and Dual USB Charging
product_meta.description: Play your music over the Bluetooth wireless connection or via the Aux-in jack, while a 2x 1 amp USB ports keep your mobile devices charged and ready to go. FM radio with 6 station presets to keep your favorite music at your fi netrins. Built-in mic, voice echo cancellation and answer and end controls make speakerphone use a pleasure. Dual alarms with dedicated alarm time display are sure to wake you in the morning. Works with free Melody voice powered personal music assistant app to play music from Spotify and more.
feature_bullets: Introducing Melody the voice powered music assistant for iHome (Speakers, headphone or clock Radio), with Melody you can use your voice to control music and content from iHeart Radio, Spotify, NPR and more!
Just down load the Free Melody App (iOS & Android) and you are a tap away  from accessing millions of songs using the power of your voice!
Wirelessly stream music from Bluetooth-enabled devices
Speakerphone with digital voice echo cancellation for clear calls
Control the Ibt231 with your voice using the melody personal voice powered music assistant app. Streams music from iHeartRadio, Spotify and more
FM radio with 6 station memory presets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
